akn:section.akn:heading: Time for proposal and adoption of rules

akn:content.akn:p: § 3344. Time for proposal and adoption of rules As appropriate, rules issued under sections 3342 and 3343 of this title shall be proposed not later than 6 months and shall be effective upon adoption in final form not later than 12 months after August 9, 1989. (Pub. L. 101–73, title XI, § 1115, Aug. 9, 1989, 103 Stat. 515.)
